summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1487, for the improvement of Ward Street from 7th Avenue North to Warren Avenue, also a public street extending from Ward Street to Taylor Avenue, through block 52, Mercer's 2nd Addition to the City of Seattle, all in the City of Seattle by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, together with all necessary wood curbs, gutters and cross walks, under Ordinance No. 15950 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
